meanings.definition: A process in which tasks are completed in stages, with each stage being completed before moving on to the next.
meanings.sent1: In pipelining, each step is finished before starting the next one.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses pipelining to ensure efficient production.
meanings.sent3: The pipelining of baking a cake involves mixing, then baking, then frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her study routine was like a well-organized pipelining of tasks.
meanings.sent5: The construction of a house follows a clear pipelining of activities.

meanings.definition: To arrange or process (a series of tasks or operations) in a pipeline.
meanings.sent1: They are pipelining the data entry process for faster results.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to start pipelining their software development.
meanings.sent3: He pipelined his morning routine to get ready faster.
meanings.sent4: The chef pipelined the cooking steps to serve the meal on time.
meanings.sent5: Pipelining the paperwork will streamline the administrative tasks.
